RelatedSentence: All three issues have topped Gallup 's most important problem list since the beginning of the year .
Three percent of people named the environment , race relations or racism and immigration or illegal immigrants as the most important problem , among others .
A quarter of Democrats named unemployment as the top problem , compared to 17 percent of Republicans .
More Republicans , 21 percent , said the economy in general is the top problem .
Only 13 percent of Democrats , by contrast , also named the economy .
